author: cnbc.com
title: Ensign Group tops Street 4Q forecasts
text:
MISSION VIEJO, Calif. (AP) _ The Ensign Group Inc. (ENSG)   fourth-quarter earnings of $11.2 million.
On a per-share basis, the Mission Viejo, California-  net income of 21 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and pretax expenses, came to 40 cents per share.
The results beat Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of three analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 39 cents per share.
The provider of nursing and rehabilitative care services posted revenue of $487.7 million in the period, also surpassing Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $459.3 million.
For the year, the company reported profit of $40.5 million, or 77 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $1.85 billion.
Ensign Group expects full-year earnings to be $1.80 to $1.87 per share.
Ensign Group shares have increased 6 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has risen 18 percent in the last 12 months.
  ENSG at https://www.zacks.com/ap/ENSG
